be_part: Be Part of Danar Mas Group
section1: PT SILVER KRIS firmly holds its reputation as a leading textile company in the spinning industry. Since 1973, we have carved a path of success by producing various types of yarn, such as PE, TR, TC, and Misty. Our expertise is not only reflected in high-quality products but also in a commitment to high corporate standards.
vision: Embracing innovation and automation to streamline production processes, ensure efficiency, and maintain competitiveness in the global market. Investing in cutting-edge technology and continually enhancing our manufacturing capabilities to stay at the forefront of the industry.
capacity_3: Annual production capacity of Bale Yarn
sales_distribution_content: We have earned a strong business reputation and established a perfect service system, and an efficient service system, earning significant admiration and support.
product_desc:
Our products include polyester, poly viscose, poly cotton, and other items. There are various 
specifications to choose from, and some products can also be customized according to your preferences.
